servinfo.title: Clutch Pedal Position (CPP) Switch Inspection and Adjustment

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Clutch Pedal Position (CPP) Switch Removal and Installation

servinfosub.title: Inspection
servinfosub.ptxt: Check for resistance between terminals under each condition below. If check result is not satisfactory, replace.

spec.title: CPP switch resistance
spec.ptxt: When switch shaft is pushed (1): Continuity
When switch shaft is free (2): No continuity

servinfosub.title: Adjustment
servinfosub.ptxt: With clutch pedal (1) released, adjust switch (2) position so that clearance between end of thread and clutch pedal arm is within specification.

spec.title: Clearance between end of thread and clutch pedal arm
